remarks: Associative-type law for group subtraction and addition.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
grpsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpaddsubass $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .- Z ) = ( X .+ ( Y .- Z ) ) ) $.
